dcterms:creator: A. Saxena
S. Chakrabarti
P. P. Talukdar
dcterms:description: CronQuestions is a temporal QA dataset based on the Wikidata TKG, comprising 125k entities, 203 relations, 1.7k timestamps and 328k facts. It contains 410K unique question-answer pairs, categorized into simple reasoning and complex reasoning based on temporal constraints.
dcterms:title: CronQuestions

dcterms:creator: T. Lacroix
G. Obozinski
N. Usunier
dcterms:description: Wikidata TKG is a temporal knowledge graph that includes entities, relations, and timestamps, used for temporal knowledge base completion.
dcterms:title: Wikidata TKG

dcterms:creator: W. Chen
X. Wang
W. Y. Wang
dcterms:description: A dataset for answering time-sensitive questions, focusing on the temporal aspects of question answering.
dcterms:title: A dataset for answering time-sensitive questions
